item.title: Raspbery Pi Camera Control Service
item.description: I have created a python / Flask based server to run on the Raspberry accepting REST calls to perform application specific functions. I have created a flask server that will accept REST requests to control the PiCamera, AdaFruitMotorSheild and other stuff. Refer to the PiCamera documentation here: https://picamera.readthedocs.io/en/release-1.13/. The software can be found in github repository. And how to write and operate a flask based server for your project.
